title: His Student Obsession
description: From the second that she walked into my class, I was a goner. There wasn’t a line I wouldn’t cross or a boundary I wouldn’t push to be near Amy. She was my obsession.She was also my student.Five years of being a university professor and I’ve never been tempted, until Amy Mackintosh walked into my class like she owned it. She was outspoken, smart and mouthy as hell.I can’t wait to tame those wicked lips.I’ll teach her everything she needs to know about this world, most of all, her place in it, by my side.When there’s a blackout after hours, and a demonstration turned riot on campus, I’ll protect Amy with every breath in my body, keep her safe until it’s over, and then…I’ll just keep her.His Obsession series features obsessed heroes who will stop at nothing to win the object of their obsession. If you love OTT possessive heroes chasing the bad-ass, sassy women who torment them, then you’ll love His Obsession series. Extra OTT, extra spicy and always HEA.
author: Gia Bailey
